name: personality-spark
description: Personality Spark - AI-powered personality discovery platform

scripts.build: cd personality-spark-api && npm install && cd ../apps/web && npm install && npm run build && cd ../.. && rm -rf personality-spark-api/public/* && cp -r apps/web/dist/* personality-spark-api/public/
scripts.postinstall: cd personality-spark-api && npm install && npm list wrangler || true
scripts.deploy: cd personality-spark-api && npm install && npm run deploy
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/web && npm install && cd ../../personality-spark-api && npm install

author: Personality Spark Team
